com.guardtime.ksi.service.client.http

Class AbstractHttpClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.guardtime.ksi.service.client.http.AbstractHttpClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    KSIExtenderClient, KSIPublicationsFileClient, KSISigningClient, Closeable, AutoCloseable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ApacheHttpClient, SimpleHttpClient

    public abstract class AbstractHttpClient
extends Object
implements KSISigningClient, KSIExtenderClient, KSIPublicationsFileClient
    Common class for all KSI HTTP clients.
